com.netflix.genie.web.services

Interface ClusterPersistenceService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JpaClusterPersistenceServiceImpl

    @Validated
public interface ClusterPersistenceService
    Abstraction layer to encapsulate data ClusterConfig functionality.
    Classes implementing this abstraction layer must be thread-safe

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      • getClusters

        org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Cluster> getClusters(@Nullable
                                                          java.lang.String name,
                                                          @Nullable
                                                          java.util.Set<ClusterStatus> statuses,
                                                          @Nullable
                                                          java.util.Set<java.lang.String> tags,
                                                          @Nullable
                                                          java.time.Instant minUpdateTime,
                                                          @Nullable
                                                          java.time.Instant maxUpdateTime,
                                                          org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable page)
        Get cluster info for various parameters. Null or empty parameters are ignored.
        Parameters:
        name - cluster name
        statuses - valid types - Types.ClusterStatus
        tags - tags allocated to this cluster
        minUpdateTime - min time when cluster configuration was updated
        maxUpdateTime - max time when cluster configuration was updated
        page - The page to get
        Returns:
        All the clusters matching the criteria

      • findClustersAndCommandsForJob

        java.util.Map<Cluster,java.lang.String> findClustersAndCommandsForJob(@NotNull(message="JobRequest object is null. Unable to continue.")
                                                                      @NotNull(message="JobRequest object is null. Unable to continue.") JobRequest jobRequest)
                                                               throws GenieException
        Find the clusters and commands that can run a job given the criteria the user asked for in the job.
        Parameters:
        jobRequest - The request to runt he job. Not null.
        Returns:
        a map of cluster to the unique id of the command to use if that cluster is used
        Throws:
        GenieException - if there is an error

      • findClustersAndCommandsForCriteria

        java.util.Map<Cluster,java.lang.String> findClustersAndCommandsForCriteria(@NotEmpty
                                                                           @NotEmpty java.util.List<Criterion> clusterCriteria,
                                                                           @NotNull
                                                                           @NotNull Criterion commandCriterion)
                                                                    throws GenieException
        Find the clusters and commands that can run a job given the criteria the user asked for in the job.
        Parameters:
        clusterCriteria - The ordered list of cluster criterion provided by user to select a cluster for a job
        commandCriterion - The criterion to use to select a command for a job on a cluster
        Returns:
        a map of cluster to the unique id of the command to use if that cluster is used
        Throws:
        GenieException - if there is an error
